author: Staff Reporter
text:
The police, on Tuesday, arrested a 19-year-old student of a private engineering college for allegedly making a hoax bomb call to CK School at Chellankuppam.

The caller told an employee of the school that bombs have been placed in the school and college run by the same management. The authorities immediately alerted the police who conducted a search in the premises and found the call to be hoax.

The Cyber Crime police traced the call to a mobile number that belonged to one Soundarapandian of Vannarapalayam in Cuddalore.

Soundarapandiyan’s son Vignesh, a first year engineering student of CK College had used his mobile to make the call to stall the .
title: Student held for hoax bomb call
